summary: The VA Employee Fairness Act of 2025 aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code, specifically Section 7422, relating to collective bargaining for employees within the Veterans Health Administration. The bill's primary goal is to modify existing authorities. It proposes removing certain subsections regarding collective bargaining while clarifying that the changes won't affect the Secretary of Veterans Affairs' existing authorities over incentive pay and expedited hiring, and other similar provisions of law.
